section.para: All requirements must state the usercase they are derived from.

section.title: We need a Configuration Management System (CMS)
The CMS system will ideally be salt
The CMS should take a system to a confiured ceph node.
The CMS should support long running operations
The CMS should be broken down into reusable components.
The CMS system should not break the system on reapplying.
The CMS system will be stable over releases
The CMS should monitor OSD fullness
section.para: I am undecided on this one. While I think Salt can do monitoring, I think this is a topic onto itself. Considering Nagios/Icinga capabilities vs. Salt with the event driven triggers, we could have some significant overlap.
